creator: j.b.kaiser@web.de
text:
By accident I had an infinite loop of RequestDispatcher.forward calls. 
To end this is I executed the shutdown script.
Tomcat did not shutdown until I decided to stop the request on the browsers
side. From my view this can be dangerous when an admin is not able to shutdown
the server in a safe manner (resp. is depending on the clients behaviour).

creator: remm@apache.org
text:
Milestone 4.1.5 changes this behavior (similar to what happens in bug 8935), 
and should not wait forever.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 8935 ***
